text: Lac de Moron is a reservoir formed by damming the Doubs River on the border of France and Switzerland. It can be reached from Les Planchettes or Les Brenets in the Canton of Neuchâtel (Switzerland) and from Le Barboux in the Doubs department (France). The reservoir has a volume of 20.6 million m³ and its surface area is . The arch dam Châtelot was completed in 1953. ==See also== *List of lakes of Switzerland ==External links== * Category:Lakes of Doubs Category:Reservoirs in Switzerland Category:Reservoirs in France Moron Lac De Moron Category:International lakes of Europe RMoron
title: Lac de Moron
